name: RingByName
0:
”Alexa, ask RingByName to call John Smith”
”Alexa, ask RingByName to call 8553457464”
”Alexa, ask RingByName to call my coworker Mary Smith”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ringbyname
des:
Make phone calls hands-free with Alexa and RingByName, the business phone service that helps you win! With this skill you can ask RingByName to initiate a call to any telephone number or extension. You can even call a stored contact by simply saying their name. Alexa will have RingByName call your phone number and connect you to the number or person requested as soon as you answer your phone. To use this skill, link your account in the Alexa app and then ask RingByName to call a phone number or a stored contact. 

Alexa devices are not currently capable of acting as a speakerphone but work to launch calls from your RingByName system. This skill is currently only available to RingByName subscribers -- for more information go to www.ringbyname.com/alexa.
